Error rendering macro 'questionslist-macro' : StatementCallback; SQL [select * from ( select "question"."CONTENTID", max("question"."CREATIONDATE"), row_number() over (order by max("question"."CREATIONDATE") desc) as "rn" from "CONTENT" "question" inner join "CONTENT_LABEL" "CONTENT_LABEL" on "CONTENT_LABEL"."CONTENTID" = "question"."CONTENTID" and "CONTENT_LABEL"."LABELID" in (-1, -1, -1, -1, -1, -1) left join "SPACES" "SPACES" on "question"."SPACEID" = "SPACES"."SPACEID" left join "SPACEPERMISSIONS" "SPACEPERMISSIONS" on "SPACES"."SPACEID" = "SPACEPERMISSIONS"."SPACEID" where "question"."PREVVER" is null and "question"."CONTENTTYPE" = 'CUSTOM' and "question"."CONTENT_STATUS" = 'current' and "question"."PLUGINKEY" = 'com.atlassian.confluence.plugins.confluence-questions:question' and ("question"."SPACEID" is null or "SPACEPERMISSIONS"."PERMTYPE" = 'VIEWSPACE' and "SPACEPERMISSIONS"."PERMGROUPNAME" is null and "SPACEPERMISSIONS"."PERMUSERNAME" is null) group by "question"."CONTENTID") a where rn > 0 and rn <= 10 order by rn]; No column name was specified for column 2 of 'a'.; nested exception is java.sql.SQLException: No column name was specified for column 2 of 'a'.

No error when the *Filter by* is changed to either "popular" or "unanswered."

Similar error seen while accessing Question List Macro if filtered by 'recent' and the 'Topic' field is not empty

!CQSbug.PNG!

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-46864].
  {panel}

A direct object reference vulnerability exists on the answers.atlassian.com platform which allows for malicious users to obtain the email address of any given ID. 

Additionally since the ID's are incremental, it would be possible for an attacker to gain the email addresses of every single Atlassian Answers user.

If the Atlassian Answers systems are linked with the main Atlassian identification system, it may be likely that every Atlassian users email address is exposed to any user.

By making the following request where [id] is modified in the GET request path, any users email address is able to be obtained:

{noformat}
GET /api/users/[id]/ HTTP/1.1
Host: answers.atlassian.com
User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; rv:29.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/29.0
Accept: */*
Accept-Language: en-US,en;q=0.5
Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflate
X-CSRFToken: 6f6f820e0235bec839d1c48a049e4d89
X-Requested-With: XMLHttpRequest
Referer: https://answers.atlassian.com/questions/299003/
Cookie: [redacted]
Connection: keep-alive
{noformat}

the following response is obtained:
{noformat}
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Server: nginx
Date: Mon, 26 May 2014 10:56:41 GMT
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
Connection: close
Vary: Authorization,Cookie
X-Frame-Options: SAMEORIGIN
Content-Length: 581
{
    "username": "[fullname]", 
    "website": "", 
    "about": "", 
    "links": {
        "badges": "/users/[id]/badges", 
        "self": "/users/[id]", 
        "questions": "/users/[id]/questions", 
        "answers": "/users/[id]/answers"
    }, 
    "tags": [], 
    "organisation": "Atlassian", 
    "answers": [no], 
    "id": [id], 
    "karma": [no], 
    "questions": 0, 
    "following": false, 
    "last_seen": "[date]", 
    "date_joined": "[date]", 
    "email": "*[email]*", 
    "badges": [no], 
    "location": ""
}
{noformat}

I was able to confirm that this vulnerability affects approximately 170,000 Atlassian users, however did not retrieve the details of accounts in the masses.
fields.summary: Direct Object Reference - User Information Disclosure
(layout) there are no line breaks

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-46862].
  {panel}

h3. Summary
Confluence Questions generate a StackOverFlowError stack trace when an Answer containing an Attachment is converted to a Comment

h3. Environment
* 6.0.0-OD-2016.07.1

h3. Steps to Reproduce
# Go to one question and attach PDF/Image/file to Answer 
# Submit answer and then convert the Answer to a Comment

h3. Expected Results
Questions post loads without error

h3. Actual Results
Attached Log: StackOverFlowError.txt
 
h3. Notes
Appears that if the file is initially added on a Comment, this error does not occur and the Comment can be converted to an Answer and back to a Comment

h3.Workaround

_In Cloud instances, this would need to be performed by Support_
- Remove the Attachment on the Comment
or 
- Convert the Comment containing an Attachment back to an Answer
fields.summary: Confluence Questions Generates a StackOverFlowError when an Answer Containing an Attachment is Converted to a Comment

{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-46856].
  {panel}

Steps to reproduce:
1. Go to https://answers.atlassian.com/account/signin/ 
2. Click "Create an Atlassian Account"
3. Taken to https://id.atlassian.com/profile/signUp.action?application=aac&continue=https://answers.atlassian.com/account/signin/
4. Fill out form to create a new account
5. Taken back to https://answers.atlassian.com/account/signin/
6. Sign in with newly created account credentials
7. Taken to https://answers.atlassian.com/account/register/
8. Specify Display Name and submit form
9. Unexpectedly taken to https://id.atlassian.com/profile/signUp.action?application=aac&continue=https://answers.atlassian.com/account/signin/

At this point, if the user returns to AAC, they are signed in and their newly created Display Name is visible in the header. The issue is the unexpected redirect in step #9.

fields.description:
I noticed that AAC was very slow when I searched for a tag. I traced the executing SQL to this:

{code:sql}
SELECT
  COUNT(*)
FROM
  "forum_node"
WHERE
  ("forum_node"."node_type" = E'answer'
  AND "forum_node"."parent_id" IN
                                   (
                                   SELECT DISTINCT
                                     U0."id"
                                   FROM
                                     "forum_node" U0 ,
                                     "forum_rootnode_doc"
                                   WHERE
                                     (U0."node_type" = E'question'
                                     AND "forum_rootnode_doc"."node_id" = "forum_node"."id"
                                     AND ("forum_rootnode_doc"."document" @@ to_tsquery('english', E'')
                                       OR "forum_node"."title" ILIKE E'%%')
                                     AND U0."node_type" = E'question'
                                     AND (U0."tagnames" ~* E'(^| )greenhopper( |$)' )
                                     AND NOT (U0."state_string"::text LIKE E'%(deleted)%' ))))
{code}

This takes 16 seconds to execute, making a very bad user experience.

I examined the SQL and discovered what I think is an error in the coding. When "forum_node" is referenced within the subselect (IN), it appears to be incorrectly referencing "forum_node" from the main level of the query, rather than "forum_node" in the subquery (which has the name of U0). This happens in two places:
* "forum_rootnode_doc"."node_id" = "forum_node"."id"
* "forum_node"."title" ILIKE E'%%'

When I changed these references from "forum_node" to U0, the query executed in 0.4 seconds and returned the same result. The reason for the speed-up is that the current query is causing the sub-clause to execute many times, whereas the fixed query only requires it to run once.

The challenge now is for you to figure out where this is being called from the OSQA code. Let me know if I can be of assistance!
fields.summary: Badly written SQL is causing AAC to slow down when searching for Tags

https://answers.atlassian.com/questions/21161/when-is-the-jira-mobile-connect-for-android-will-be-released

...it infinite hangs with also the "progress propellor" twirling away in the corner with a JS error (see attachment 2).

I let it run 5 mins, and nothing happened. When refreshing the page, things are fine again, and the vote never occured.

Reported by a customer in SAC on the issue EHSP-21794.

Best regards,
Lucas Timm
fields.summary: AAC Up-Vote JS Causes Infinite Hang in IE8
Signup not working in Firefox

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-46810].
  {panel}

After a couple of users reach 1000 points, their user screen 
questions/users?username=USERNAME

became unavalable

Confluence 5.8.10

Regards
Nelson

  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-46804].
  {panel}

Hi,

The question https://answers.atlassian.com/questions/247468/is-there-a-way-to-make-it-so-that-there-is-one-notification-per-24-hours keeps sending notifications every 10 seconds or so, since 24 hours.

We're at 2000 emails, and it keeps sending. Also, there are 147 followers for that question.

I shall suggest to suspend the mail server, maybe?

Also I have a request for my karma: It has not been incremented 2000 times ;)

Best regards,
Adrien

on EAC today we saw CQ fail to startup simply because it couldn't find an index file it was looking for:

{code}

# Open questions in Confluence

 !Screen Shot 2017-01-13 at 1.36.33 PM.png|thumbnail!

May be related to https://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CQ-2123

In some cases, trying to upload an attachment to an answer or comment in CQ results in this error:
!error.png|thumbnail!

h3. Steps to Reproduce
# Click 'Questions' in the top menu
# Select a question (or create one, if none exists)
# Under 'Your answer' select the 'Insert Image' button
# Drag and drop any file
# The error will appear

h3. Expected Results
Attachment is added.

h3. Actual Results
It fails with this error:
{noformat}
No content found.
{noformat}

h3.Workaround
None so far

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-46777].
  {panel}

h2. Steps to reproduce

1. Answer a question
2. (An email notification will be generated)
3. Convert the answer to a comment
4. Click the link to view the content from the notification from Step 2.
5. Attempt to add a new comment

h2. Expected Behaviour

The editor loads and allows me to add a comment

h2. Actual Behaviour

The editor does not finish loading. Additionally, the follow JavaScript error is reported to the console when the page loads:

{noformat}
Uncaught TypeError: Cannot read property 'scrollIntoView' of undefined
{noformat}

h2. Workaround

Modify the request URL to remove the reference to the offending piece of content.  For example, if the URL you clicked was:
* [https://answers.atlassian.com/questions/38397449/answers/38505072]

Try this URL instead:
* [https://answers.atlassian.com/questions/38397449]

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-46773].
  {panel}

Hi Dennis and Jeremy,

I've spoken to each of you independently over the course of the past few weeks to discuss changes needed in AAC as part of the Brand Amplification effort led by Ken Olofsen. I'd like to connect to make sure we have the right level of attention on the changes being made in AAC, apologies if its overkill.

On July 22, 2013 GreenHopper and Bonfire will effectively be renamed to JIRA Agile Planner and JIRA Agile Tester to amplify the JIRA brand. This decision was made by Ken and the Executive Team some time ago. Ken is relying on the "asset owners" of various different systems to make the changes that reflect the decisions made around Brand Amplification.

To ensure that all of the details of this change are covered I've created a list of detailed tasks in ServiceDog. 

These tasks include:
1. (/) For every question that is already tagged as "greenhopper", add a new tag "jira-agile"
2. (/) For every question that is already tagged as "bonfire", add a new tag "jira-capture"
3. (/) Rename "GreenHopper" to "JIRA Agile" on the Ask a Question tag wizard
4. (/) Rename "Bonfire" to "JIRA Capture" on the Ask  a Question tag wizard
5. (/) Remove "JIRA Agile" from the top-level Ask a Question tag row, and move to the second level
6. (x) Rename "Bonfire" to "JIRA Capture" on the Answers Leaderboard - *Bonfire has been replaced with Stash on the Leaderboard*
7. (x) Rename "GreenHopper" to "JIRA Agile" on the Answers Leaderboard - *GreenHopper has been replaced with Crowd on the Leaderboard*
8. (/) Rename GreenHopper product badges to JIRA Agile.
9. (/) Remove GreenHopper logo on product badges, add JIRA logo.

Please take a look at the above tasks and identify any potential dependencies or complications with those stated above that might hinder us from hitting the July 22, 2013 go-live date. 

I have a status tracker for the Brand Amplification project listed here: https://extranet.atlassian.com/display/SUPPORT/Bramplification+Status+Tracker

You can use the status tracker to identify any blockers and/or articulate your status.

Thanks,
Alex

fields.description:
h3. Summary
When trying to upload an image from local machine, there are two different UIs popped up.
+UI1+
!Screenshot1.jpeg|thumbnail!
+UI2+
!Screenshot3.jpeg|thumbnail!
Everything is working fine if UI2 is popped up on the first place. However, there's problem to insert image when UI1 is popped up.

h3. Steps to Reproduce
# Go to any question > "Add you comment..."
# Insert image
# Make sure UI1 is popped up
# Click on the *Upload* button, it is not functioning
# Click on *Close*
# This time, UI2 is shown with two *Help* on the top-right corner. (Purple box show in screenshot below)
# Upload files
# After finish uploading, *Insert* button is not clickable.

!Screentshot2.jpeg|thumbnail!

h3. Expected Results
# Only 1 UI shows
# When *Upload* button is clicked, local files are showing
# *Insert* button is clickable after image finished uploading

h3. Actual Results
# Two UIs show at the same time
# *Upload* button is not functioning on the fisrt UI
# *Insert* button is not clickable after image finished uploading

h3. Note
* This issue only happens when UI1 pops up on the first place.
* Everything is working fine if UI2 pops up on the first place.

h3.Workaround
Google Chrome
* Right click the tab, *Duplicate*

Other browsers
* Copy the URL > Paste on the new tab > Enter

fields.description:
Not highly important, but might impact SEO ranking.

The links at the bottom of each Answers page have an extra slash in them after ".com":
* http://www.atlassian.com//software/jira/tour/bug-tracking.jsp
* http://www.atlassian.com//software/jira/tour/project-tracking.jsp
* http://www.atlassian.com//hosted/studio/tour/subversion-svn-hosting.jsp
* http://www.atlassian.com//software/confluence/
fields.summary: Links at bottom of page have double-slash

fields.description:
When you go over the character limit in the comments section it tells you you have exceeded the limit.
When you reduce your characters and submit again, it still says you have exceeded your limit - even though you have characters left.

Maybe the characters being displayed and the actual characters count is different some how??
